hero.title: Smart Crypto Market Analysis
hero.subtitle: Aggregate news, trend analysis, and price forecasts from trusted sources. Make smart investment decisions with CryptoInsight.

features.title: Smart Investment Tools
features.subtitle: CryptoInsight provides powerful tools to track and analyze the cryptocurrency market professionally

trendAnalysis.title: Trend Analysis
trendAnalysis.description: In-depth analysis of cryptocurrency market trends based on historical data and predictive models. Track the latest market trends.

latestNews.title: Latest News
latestNews.description: Latest news updates from trusted sources in the cryptocurrency world, automatically aggregated and categorized by impact level.

volatilityAlerts.title: Volatility Alerts
volatilityAlerts.description: Receive timely notifications about major price fluctuations to make quick decisions. Customize alert levels according to personal needs.

technicalAnalysis.title: Technical Analysis
technicalAnalysis.description: Advanced technical analysis tools help you better understand price movements and trading volumes with leading technical indicators.

fastTrading.title: Fast Trading
fastTrading.description: Execute trades in seconds with a simple, intuitive interface. Track transaction status and receive notifications when completed.

maximumSecurity.title: Maximum Security
maximumSecurity.description: Multi-layered security system with two-factor authentication, end-to-end encryption, and continuous monitoring to absolutely protect your assets.

continuousUpdates.title: Continuous Updates
continuousUpdates.description: Data is updated in real-time, helping you not miss any trading opportunities with the most accurate and timely information.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Experience
crossPlatform.description: Access services from any device with a consistent experience. Mobile apps optimized for both iOS and Android with full features.

news.title: Latest news about
news.subtitle: Compilation of the latest news and analysis from trusted sources, updated continuously 24/7

analysis.title: Crypto market analysis
analysis.subtitle: Track price movements, trading volumes, and key indicators to make informed investment decisions

technicalCharts.title: Technical Charts
technicalCharts.description: Analyze prices in real-time with technical indicators such as MACD, RSI, and Bollinger Bands.

volumeAnalysis.title: Volume Analysis
volumeAnalysis.description: Track trading volumes and detect accumulation or distribution patterns.

portfolio.title: Investment Portfolio
portfolio.description: Manage and analyze your investment portfolio with performance tracking tools.

weeklyReport.title: Get weekly analysis reports
weeklyReport.subtitle: Subscribe to receive in-depth analysis reports about the crypto market every week.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Do you have questions or need support? Our team of experts is always ready to help you 24/7
